Articles.Content:
Challenge: make a craft in KSP that transforms from one form to another - and back again. At least one of these forms must be a functional form of transportation.

Occupants are optional, as is usefulness - though practical designs are encouraged.

Examples may be vehicle to robot, boat to plane, helicopter to box, etc., and creativity is rewarded.

Rules:

  • Vehicles may be stock or non-stock
  • All mods are permitted
  • Custom decals are encouraged
  • Part clipping is permitted, though excessive use may count against you
  • Gravity/collisions/finite electricity & fuel may be reduced/turned off, but you must declare this

If this challenge sees interest, I'm thinking of creating badges along similar lines as the Oscars (though hopefully more popular!), and am happy to accept suggestions for relevant categories:

  • (Nominated for/winner of) Best original design
  • Best recreation
  • Most innovative concept
  • Best overall presentation of a transformer
  • etc.

Videos are strongly encouraged, but still images showing all of pre-, post- and mid- transformation states will be accepted (preferably linked with a craft file so that others can appreciate the transformation, but console players are excused)

Here is own effort to kick off the challenge (infinite electricity was used, but gravity and collisions were normal):

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YnrSO3Tb_NA
If anyone is wanting inspiration: make something like this, and I will come up with a new prize category just for you!
